titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Sonny Bono, a Representative from the State of California.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Lewis (CA) asked unanimous consent that the time for debate on H. Res. 338 be extended for an additional 20 minutes. Agreed to without objection.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with twenty minutes of additional debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/27/1998--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Representative Sonny Bono of California.
